titles: Heire begynnis the traitie of Orpheus kyng and how he yeid to hewyn: to hel to seik his quene and ane othir ballad in the lattir end.

notes: Chepman's device (McKerrow 29) on title page and Myllar's device (McKerrow 22) at end.
